result.execSummary:
The defendant Eric R Schroeder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Eric R Schroeder in court with attorney Joseph Thomas Domask.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pretrial conference conducted.  Parties have reached a resolution.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 05-06-2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Eric R Schroeder
Current: 13515 Kenmark Court, Brookfield, WI 53005   (Effective: 04-29-2015)
Prior: 13515 Kenmark Court, Brookfield, WI 53005
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Durham Auto Savage

Defendant Eric R Schroeder in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.24  for a Pretrial Conference.VB
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 4/29/15 @ 1:30 pm
